name: NOTION_API_KEY
description: The API key for the Notion integration, required for all operations.

name: NOTION_QUERY_APP_DATA_DIR
description: The root directory for storing local data, including the RAG index and synced content. Defaults to the 'rag-data' directory within the project root.

name: NOTION_SYNC_BATCH_SIZE
description: The number of pages to process in each synchronization cycle.

name: NOTION_SYNC_INTERVAL_MS
description: The interval in milliseconds between synchronization cycles.

name: NOTION_GC_INTERVAL_MS
description: The interval in milliseconds for running the local file garbage collection task.
